pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Cosmic Fury (2023, TV show)

Obtained by having an empty leg slot and with the $(l:dino_charge/items/dino_chargers#spinosaurus_dino_charger)Spino Charger$(/l) in the Main Hand and the $(l:dino_charge/arsenal/spino_boomerang)Spino Boomerang$(/l) in your Off Hand.
